VAGAS_QUE_EXIGEM: Projects that require commitment for a longer period.
NECESSARIO: It is necessary to dedicate oneself for a short time, in a day or a week, to accomplish the activities.
EXIGE_COMPROMETIMENTO: It requires commitment for a longer period, for months or years.
E_NECESSARIO: It is necessary to dedicate for a short time, in a day or a week for the accomplishment of activities.
faq.title: Help Center
app.name: Channel
app.description: Channel is a global day that unites people from 108 countries to do good deeds for the benefit of others and the planet
meta.title: Channel
DICAS_HEADER: For a complete description make sure that the text includes the following points:
DESCREVA: Describe the activities the volunteer will perform
ESCREVA: Write about what your NGO does, how it started, stories ..
CRIE_CONTA: Create a user account to be able to register your NGO
RESUMO_HINT: Make an attractive and short invitation for the work. This should be inviting as it will be the volunteer's first impression of the job.
RESUMO_PLACEHOLDER: Eg: We are a network that aims to increase the impact of social organizations by mobilizing people.
IMAGEM_HINT: Like the name, the image should be very attractive and related to the project!
IMAGEM_HINT2: Upload a JPG, JPEG, PNG, or GIF image of up to 2MB.
ENDERECO_HINT: Start typing and select an option
ENDERECO_PLACEHOLDER: Show address on the NGO page
CAUSAS_HINT: Select up to 3 causes that best define the project
E_MUITO: It is very important to communicate with the volunteers after receiving their applications.
NOSSA_EQUIPE: Our team will review the registration of this project as soon as possible. Stay tuned for your email.
PODE_ACESSAR: Você já pode acessar a página da vaga pra ver como ela está e fazer edições caso seja necessário.
FUNDAMENTAL: Correct data is essential, so volunteers can contact you after the registration.
CONTINUE_DO_PONTO: Continue from the point you stopped
AS_INFORMACOES: Public to be served by volunteering
DESCARTAR: Discard the information I had already filled in
FACA_PARTE: BE A PART OF OUR NETWORK
PESSOAS_INTERESSADAS: More than 80,000 people interested in volunteering
SE_SUA_ONG: If your NGO, collective or social movement is looking for volunteers to collaborate with your cause, tell the Atados network.
A_INSCRICAO: Enrollment starts working from the following steps. Once completed, the information will be reviewed by our team.
FIQUE_ATENTO: Stay tuned for dates and contact the NGO for more information.
A_DISTANCIA: You can act from a distance
AO_CANCELAR: By canceling your subscriptions you will no longer be part of this project. Don't worry, you can subscribe again.
CONFIRMA_CANCELAR: Cancel my subscription on this Project
DECLARO: I declare that I have read and accept the
AO_CONFIRMAR: By confirming the application you commit to be part of this project as a volunteer. The NGO will be informed of your application and will contact you.
MANTENHA: Keep your contacts updated so that the person in charge can contact you.
HINT: You can add links and formatting to the text
PODE_EDITAR: You can edit this information at any time in the Settings.
PUBLICO: The public to be served by volunteering
SE_HOUVER: If there is capacity building, it is important to mention
DESCREVA_CLAREZA: Clearly describe the purpose of the project.
PLACEHOLDER: Make a full description and leave a good invitation. This ensures that more volunteers apply for this project.
COMO_VAI: HOW YOUR PROJECT WILL BE SEEN:
NOME_VAGA_HINT: Put a catchy name, something that catches the volunteers' attention.
EX_RESUMO: Eg: On 09/04, we will install baskets for the exclusive disposal of cans, facilitating the collection by the pickers. Be part of this urban and collective intervention.
HABILIDADES_HINT: Select one or more skills for the volunteer
RESPONSIBLE_HINT: Select the person who will be responsible for coordinating the volunteers. They will be responsible for answering them.
PREENCHA_INFORMACOES: Fill in the date and attendance information to volunteer in the project
VAGA_DISTANCIA: This project can be done at a distance
MARQUE_CASO: Check if this project accepts remote volunteers
COMO_COMECAR: How would you like to start?
SALVAMOS: We have saved your last drafts so it won't be lost.
PRECISA: Do you need different volunteers for the same project? Instead of creating multiple projects, create one with multiple volunteer roles. This facilitates sharing and focuses opportunities.
INSIRA_FUNCOES: Enter the roles the volunteer will perform in this action.
DOCUMENTOS_HINT: Here you can add files that will be available in the project.
VAGA_ATRATIVA: Add photos to make your project more attractive and show how that action went.
ESSA_VAGA: This project doesn't have any posts yet
AS_PUB: Posts are a space for the history of this project. Tell what's going on!
VAGA_DESCRICAO: This project happens on specific dates. Check the dates below and what will happen.
DESCRICAO_HORARIO: Read below the timetable to work in this project.
DISTANCIA: You can act from a distance
PODE_SER: It could be done at a distance
VAGA_ENCERRADA_TEXT: This project no longer needs volunteers. But you don't have to stop here! Click below to find other related projects.
VAGAS_COMO: The projects are no longer available
VAGAS_COMO2: The projects are no longer available
VAGAS_ESGOTADAS: The projects are no longer available

pages.about.title: About the event
pages.about.subtitle: 108 countries worldwide have taken part in Good Deeds Day. Here’s the story and mission of the global annual event:
pages.about.body.nutshell.title: IN A NUTSHELL
pages.about.body.nutshell.body: Good Deeds Day is an annual tradition of good deeds. All over the world, hundreds of thousands choose to volunteer and help others, putting into practice the simple idea that every single person can do something good, be it large or small, to improve the lives of others and positively change the world.
pages.about.body.vision.title: THE VISION
pages.about.body.vision.text: Good Deeds Day was initiated in 2007 by businesswoman and philanthropist, Shari Arison, and launched and organized by Ruach Tova (NGO), a part of The Ted Arison Family Foundation, the philanthropic arm of the Arison Group. “I believe that if people will think good, speak good and do good, the circles of goodness will grow in the world. Good Deeds Day has become the leading day of giving and this year individuals, school children, students, soldiers and employees from many businesses are joining in for the annual Good Deeds Day with the aim of doing a good deed for others,” says Shari Arison.
pages.about.body.evolution.title: THE EVOLUTION OF GOOD DEEDS DAY
pages.about.body.evolution.body.1: Good Deeds Day is taking over the world!
pages.about.evolution.text: Since its launch in 2007, this annual tradition of good has grown from 7,000 participants in 2007 in Israel to almost 1 million in 2015. Going global in 2011 with 10 international cities, including many in the USA, Good Deeds Day began uniting people all over the world. In 2012, we reached Europe and teamed up with MTV Global for a six-week-campaign on its online and TV platforms, exposing the message to 24 million viewers around the world. In 2013, 16,000 volunteers from 50 countries took part in hundreds of projects, including a kick off with ABC Network in NYC. Next, Good Deeds Day doubled in reach in 2014, partnering for the second year in a row with ABC Network NYC, and collaborating with leading volunteer organizations as part of a grand scale campaign involving TV, radio, and social media. 500,000 people took part in Israel and some 35,000 globally. Good Deeds Day continued to gain momentum and held its largest day yet on April 7, 2019. 3,900,000 participants from 108 countries took part in Good Deeds Day, totaling over 7.8 million hours of service.
